mapper.select: select b.height as height, b.create_date as createDate , b.tx_count as txCount, ifnull(b.hash, '-') as hash, ifnull(b.amount,'-') as amount, ifnull(b.fee,'-') as fee, bt.c_rep as peerId from T_BLOCK b, T_BLOCK_TOTAL bt where b.height=bt.height order by b.height desc limit ${page}, ${counting}
select height from T_BLOCK_TOTAL order by id desc limit 1;
select tx_hash as txHash, from_addr as fromAddr, to_addr as toAddr, amount as amount , ifnull(fee ,'-') as fee from T_TRANSACTION_TOTAL where hash = #{hash} limit ${page} , ${counting}
select tx_count from T_BLOCK_TOTAL where height = #{height}
select tx_count from T_BLOCK_TOTAL where hash = #{hash}
select block_height as blockHeight , hash , tx_count as txCount, create_date as createDate from T_MAIN_BLOCK order by block_height desc limit 20

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_date , "%Y-%m-%d") as targetDate, sum(tx_count) as txCount FROM T_BLOCK_TOTAL WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(create_date) <= 15 and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(create_date) != 0 GROUP BY targetDate
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_date , "%Y-%m-%d") as targetDate, sum(tx_count) as txCount FROM T_BLOCK WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(create_date) <= 0
